1.content:

As he continues, he begins to masturbate while thinking “What would it be like if I...”

11.content:

The next morning Jeff wakes up and gets out of bed. He walks to the bathroom, relieves himself as he does every morning, and starts to brush his teeth. We he looks in the mirror, he notices something a little off....
11.title: Had her body (Slow)?

info.brief_description: Ever wonder what it would be like to become the object of millions of people’s lust?
info.description:
Meet Jeff. He is a senior in high school with great grades and aspirations to do great things. One thing that nobody knows about Jeff is that he is obsessed with the big bootied Latina pornstar, Abella Danger.

One night before bed, Jeff is watching one of her videos and makes an off-handed wish that will change his life forever....
